tool_description: Calculates various fees for multi-currency transactions including processing, conversion, and regulatory fees based on transaction details and fee structures.

transaction_amount.description: Base transaction amount for fee calculation

payment_method.description: Payment method: card, bank_transfer, wallet, crypto

volume_discount_eligible.description: Whether transaction qualifies for volume discounts

error_messages: Invalid transaction amount: Amount must be positive and within processing limits.
Invalid currency codes: Use valid ISO 4217 currency codes for source and target.
Invalid payment method: Use one of [card, bank_transfer, wallet, crypto].
Invalid customer tier: Use one of [basic, premium, enterprise].
Invalid transaction type: Use one of [purchase, refund, transfer].
Invalid processing region: Use one of [domestic, international, high_risk].
Custom fee rate format error: Use format 'FEE_TYPE:RATE' for custom_fee_rates.
usage: Provide transaction_amount, currencies, and payment_method. Optionally set customer_tier, transaction_type, processing_region, volume_discount_eligible, and custom_fee_rates. Returns detailed fee breakdown.

effective_fee_rate.description: Total fees as percentage of transaction amount

fee_breakdown.description: Detailed breakdown of each fee component
